articles.title: Mahikeng exempt from load shedding after days of power outages - but only for 72 hours
articles.description: Mahikeng in the North West has received a 72-hour load shedding stay as businesses and consumers attempt to recover from more than 10 days without electricity.
articles.content:
• Mahikeng has received a 72-hour exemption from load shedding.
  • The town has been without power for more than 10 days after an explosion at a substation.
